subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danny Granger scored 14 of his 16 points in the fourth quarter and overtime as the Pacers rallied from a 20-point second-half deficit to beat the Miami Heat, 96-94, last night in Indianapolis.
snippet: Danny Granger scored 14 of his 16 points in the fourth quarter and overtime as the Pacers rallied from a 20-point second-half deficit to beat the Miami Heat, 96-94, last night in Indianapolis.
